Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2008 05:29PM elbo wrote: Since you are already wondering if you should be concerned and your mom has immediate family history, why not call your doctor and get it checked out? You are not being a nuisance and you are not a hypochondriac. By the way, please encourage your mom to get her annual exam. If she cannot afford it, visit the Cancer Society website for where to get free screening. The fact that her sister had it puts herÂ at elevated risk. There's no reason to worry, but no reason to live in denial either!
